Instacart
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(p8105.datasets)

library(plotly)
```

# loading the data and filter the ones under the department 'alcohol'
```{r}
data("instacart")

instacart_df = 
  instacart %>% 
  filter(department == "alcohol") %>% view()

```
